message.body: :( I got 5 new bites just last night FYI bc I didn't dry my stuff and I attempted to put bed against wall again like a normal human
Not even all the way, but just...a few inches away from wall so I can put a dresser in here
I'm going to talk to Kevin in the morning & get the new exterminator out ASAP. I'll call you to coordinate.
I texted Kevin about the other exterminator. I then called Beth to tell her I was done with Cindy. Before I told her she told me she thinks she can get over there tomorrow.
She said she still isn't really doing steps. But she said she can make it up to your room. I have her your number. She said she is going to call you later.
I told her I didn't want to set back her therapy at all but she pretty much insisted upon it. As much as I was seriously unimpressed by Cindy. Beth is amazing.
She called me but I'm confused about what this will change but ok
She said she'll come tomorrow and dust and that's fine we will see
Cindy is ....... Lets say overwhelmed. Beth is like Superwoman when it comes to killing bugs specifically bed bugs.
Is there anyway you could meet her tomorrow?
I'm not exaggerating. Beth is incredible.
If Beth hasn't blown out her knee she would have gotten rid of the bedbugs a couple months ago.
